LanguageData.HiveAttackTarget: Drafted pawns attack hives(in vanilla enadbled by default)
LanguageData.ShareTheLoad_DeliverAsMuchAsYouCan: Deliver resources even if there's not enough to finish the building
LanguageData.ReplaceStuff_CornerBuildable: Corner tiles are buildable and mineable from inside
LanguageData.DropOneWithControl: Hold Ctrl to drop one item from the pawn inventory instead of a stack
LanguageData.AT_AllowedAreaTip: Shift + click: mass restrict allowed area\nCtrl + click: manage areas
LanguageData.AT_Credits: Part of the tweaks taken from: ShareTheLoad, ReplaceStuff, MehniMiscModifications, TDEnhancmentPack
